case.state: Well, I've made it... I'm a bit nervous, but I trust Mari's advice!
Deep breaths, Basil, deep breaths...
I-Is it alright if I call you Geist instead? I know a, uh, Polly, and it'd be... hard to focus on the game if I'm thinking of her.
Rock music isn't my preferred genre, but I'll be sure to give your music a listen sometime!
Ooh, it's exciting to meet another photographer!
Hopefully this gives me more of an adult aura.
Maybe people will stop thinking I'm a kid after this.
I think... I need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~. That should work, hopefully...
Please let this hand be good enough... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, please.
Hm, okay, maybe... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~?
O-Okay, let me think... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, please.
Heh, maybe some of Sunny's skill rubbed off on me.
Absolutely picturesque!
Reminds me of a lovely bouquet.
A hand for the album, ehehe.
The sweet smell of victory almost compares to fresh flowers.
Always look to the good, like a sunflower.
C'mon, please not me...
I wonder what Polly's up to right now.
Simple and modest, though I'm not sure about perfect.
Not worth commemorating...
Ugh, I've got Hero's luck...
These cards stink of rafflesia.
... send some nightshade to the dealer.
Think happy thoughts, Basil, avoid the dark impulses...
I can't believe Mari roped me into this.
Oh, um, well! I-It wasn't my intention to only play against women! Th-This was just the nearest table I joined!
Oh, Sunny has one of those... maybe I should ask if I can borrow it next time I go...
Not poker specifically, but I do play card games with my friends once in a while! I tend to win, eheh...
L-Look, I just thought this would... be a way to help me become more mature! More confident!
I might not look it, but I really like murder mysteries, ehe! There's this one I read when I was... probably too young with a crazy twist!
I-I mean, I don't think there'd be anything wrong with it if you did...
My favorite plant has to be Sunflowers! Standing tall and always looking towards the bright side, that's how I want to be.
A-assassin...?!
W-why would I share that kind of information?!
Heh, yeah; my friends Kel and Aubrey have been constantly butting heads for pretty much as long as they knew each other. They always make up in the end, though!
U-Um, well... I don't see a scar...
I like your pink hair! It reminds me of my friend, Aubrey.
I really hope that weapon's just for intimidation...
Do any of you have a favorite flower? Mine is sunflowers; always looking towards the bright side, that's how I want to be.
I just... feel like I don't get taken seriously. I'm 18, but I still get treated like a kid... even my friends forgot I was an adult the other day.
I... have no idea what you're trying to ask me. I just really like flowers.
W-well, that would be lovely, b-but I don't think anyone's able to do that...
I-I think I'll pass... I wouldn't mind introducing you to my f-friends, though...
W-Well, actually, I still have my hairpin... it's really important to me, so I held off on it...
U-Um, well...! I don't think Sunny would w-want to go here---h-he's even shyer than I am!
(Just ignore her...)
Ah, it's a forget-me-not. They symbolize memories, loyalty, and strong bonds!
Yeah... it's a shame. My friends like them too, but sometimes I feel like they're just humoring me because of how much I tend to talk about them...
Ah, well, not a greenhouse, I just really like flowers. I grow a bunch all around my house!
Ah, lavender tea is really nice... It's impressive how versatile lavenders are, huh? Teas, desserts, fragrances, color...
Hm... maybe I could lend you some of mine! Polly says I might need to make a bit more space if I'm going to keep adding more plants...
Almond is nice... though are other teas expensive in your r-region?
Well, I suppose I can't win every hand... usually...
This isn't so bad... It was actually getting a bit warm in here...
Aw, my socks were actually pretty comfortable.
E-Eep. This is... getting tense...
I-I guess my hairpin has to go i-if I'm up again. This thing's really special to me, so please don't lose it, okay?!
O-Oh geez... I-I'm out of things...
Well, my luck was going to turn around eventually...
Well, my luck was going to run out eventually...
C-come on, give me a chance...
This doesn't feel fair...
H-How rude! Th-That's not what I meant at all!
It's... really nice. The colorful flowers and pleasant fragrances are soothing, and it's comforting to just relax amidst the plants...
... Um, how does that let you control the rain?
W-Well, you're in that group since you don't have many, right? I-I thought I could offer to broaden your horizons...
N-no... Aubrey said I looked really good wearing flowers, so I got one. I even got a matching one for Sunny, but he doesn't wear it very often...
Sh-Shush! I don't have to tell you!!
Well, you're just... {small}really pretty... {!reset} (You remind me a bit of Aubrey...)
Ah, well, personally, my favorite are sunflowers; always looking towards the bright side of life, that's what I want to be like.
Thanks... it's nice to hear that. Sorry, I just doubt myself really easily... my friends are always telling me to believe in myself more, but it's hard.
Indeed. My friends come over a lot for the atmosphere. The soothing fragrances, the vibrant colors, Polly and I put a lot of work into keeping it cozy!
Y-yeah! I try to grow all kinds of f-flowers...
Aw, that'd be lovely! Just... maybe later, when I'm more composed...
If y-you'd like, it could be my treat. It really wouldn't be a burden.
Polly is always saying I should diversify my wardrobe. Maybe I should let her take me shopping sometime.
Should I let Aubrey help me pick new clothes? She's always telling me how nice I'd look if I tried matching her punk aesthetic...
Perhaps K-Kel will help me... "g-get some new threads" as he put it? Sportswear would help if I ever wanted to t-tag along on his jogs or whatever...
Hero always has good advice. I'm sure he'd be able to help me find something stylish but practical.
I c-can't believe I let Mari talk me into t-this! I don't feel more adult at all. Just... um, randy.
Please don't say anything...
Off go my oxfords... I liked matching with Sunny.
W-Well, yeah! That's the point.
I-I mean, I just grow my flowers around my house. I don't really need more space...
Well, I did well in my environmental science class... and I'm pretty sure it's not that simple.
I... don't think that's an effective recruitment strategy...
Ehe, I prefer sunflowers...
Sunny is a lot more like white tulips than sunflowers: simple, modest, and per—uh, um, bulbous... yes...
Yes, I am. Gardening is good exercise.
Aw, thanks, teehee! I don't think I've met someone as interested in flowers as me! Well, other than Charlie.
Hah... I'm not very religious, but I'll try to keep my head up high!
Maybe you could visit after the game! Polly's always happy to accommodate guests.
I'd gladly tell you all about different plants that are easy to grow indoors!
It's a date, then!
That's really kind of you...
He's really sporty and laid back, though him and Aubrey butt heads a lot. He reminds me like a cactus, because of how resilient he is---almost nothing shakes him for long!
Oh, um... sorry, you wouldn't know who that is, huh? He's my best friend! Simple, modest, and perfect, like white tulips.
Polly is my mo—um, er... my caretaker. My parents aren't home often, so she takes care of me and the house...
Ah, she's another one of my friends! She's really strong, physically and in personality, so she reminds me of a gladiolus.
He's Kel's older brother, but he's really like an older brother to all of us! He's good at cooking, super smart, great at persuading people... He's like a rose: versatile and widely loved.
She's Sunny's older sister. She's really sweet and nurturing most of the time, like a lily of the valley, but she also really likes playing pranks... That smug grin of hers is scary.
Just... can we wrap this up quickly, please?
O-Oh my, another boy here...?
Hopefully you can provide something worth a photo.
Ohoho...
Come on...
Exciting!
I wonder how much prettier you'll be...
What will you take off?
Survived another round.
Exhilarating!
What'll happen next?
Is everything alright, Miss Nayru...? There's... something behind you...
Hopefully you can provide something worth a picture.
Hehehe...
Come on...
(It's like watching a garden expand and grow, but in reverse...)
Let's see if this changes your look.
I wonder how much cuter you'll be...
What will you take off next, I wonder...?
Hehe, don't hold it against me...
Survived another round.
How exhilarating!
What'll happen next?
Well, one of us was going to have to lose...
Time to line up a good shot...
Oh, um, please don't mind if I have my camera out...
Just pretend I'm not even here...
Ah, don't worry, I'd never redistribute these sorts of photos! Just... for the memories.
Well... this is unexpected...
EEP! Is that an actual rocket launcher?! Why would you bring hat?!
You know, I've been trying to convince my friend Sunny to accessorize a bit more... his style's really plain.
Hm, I wonder how you would look with a flower pin...
That's so mean...
Maybe I should have asked Hero about his earrings before I went here...
O-oh...well, it's nice to change up your style once in a while...
One step closer...
Aw, that one's actually kind of cute...
(Geez, that was disappointing...)
(I can't believe I lost so early...)
Back to the game! I'm going to win.
Gosh, I guess I am feeling a bit more mature...
You know, I once made flower pins for my friends. I wonder if wearing two hairpins would have been frowned upon...
Perhaps Sunny would have lent me his eyepatch?
Well, at any rate, it's gone now...
I wonder what's getting lost next round...
Woah...! Is that... magic? Click click click!
Wow, really? Actual royalty? Can I snap some pictures? Click click click!
(I wonder what Aubrey would look like with her hair styled differently...)
(Maybe Sunny would try out pigtails if I asked...)
Hm... I think I do like this new look!
Hehe!
Maybe I should have asked to borrow Mari's tie...
I wonder if Aubrey would loaned me her hairband if I asked...
One step closer...
Aw, that one's actually kind of cute...
Aw, it's sweet to see a celebrity who's so friendly with their fans.
Oh, that's really fascinating, but what about, uh... the rest of the space suit?
W-well, g-get on with it!
Alright, I think I'm getting into the swing of things.
Gosh, I guess I am feeling a bit more mature...
I-I still have a chance! I won't lose.
Let's hurry up the game!
Well, at any rate, it's gone now...
I wonder what's getting lost next round...
I should just... relax. Yeah! Everything... will be okay.
I should ask if they allow flash photography, the lighting is a bit weird here...
Hmm... I wonder what I should plant next in the garden? Maybe...
... I'm craving bananas for some reason.
I wonder why floral prints fell out of favor.
(Did I underdress for this? ...Maybe I should have found some other stuff to put on...)
Have to pull the weeds before you can tend to the plants...
Like lining up for the picture perfect shot.
Planting the seed...
Hedges get trimmed, trees get pruned....
(I guess I should just... go with it? Just need to relax...)
Okay. Let's just... keep going, I guess.
I wonder, what kind of flower would suit you, ~target~...
I wonder what kind of flower would go with ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~... I mean, um, if you were still wearing it, anyways.
Everything will be okay... I just need to look on the bright side! Hopefully, I'll get lucky...
Do they have a menu here? I could really go for some strawberries...
I should ask if they allow flash photography, the lighting is a bit weird here...
Okay. Let's keep going with this... uhm, experience!
Hopefully something more worth commemorating happens next round.
Should I even use my film on this?
Patience...
Onto the next round?
I don't think so... there are quite a number of interesting people here! Follow your heart.
E-Eek! This is... too far for special effects, if that really is what's going on here...
I should just... relax. Yeah! Everything... will be okay.
I should ask if they allow flash photography, the lighting is a bit weird here...
Hmm... I wonder what I should plant next in the garden? Maybe...
Do they have a menu here? I could really go for some strawberries...
... I'm craving bananas for some reason.
I wonder why floral prints fell out of favor.
(Did I underdress for this? ...Maybe I should have found some other stuff to put on...)
Have to pull the weeds before you can tend to the plants...
Like lining up for the picture perfect shot.
Planting the seed...
Hedges get trimmed, trees get pruned....
(I guess I should just... go with it? Just need to relax...)
Okay. Let's just... keep going, I guess.
I wonder, what kind of flower would suit you, ~target~...
I wonder what kind of flower would go with that ~clothing~... I mean, um, if you were still wearing it, anyways.
Everything will be okay... I just need to look on the bright side! Hopefully, I'll get lucky...
Do they have a menu here? I could really go for some strawberries...
I should ask if they allow flash photography, the lighting is a bit weird here...
Okay. Let's keep going with this... uhm, experience!
Hopefully something more worth commemorating happens next round.
Should I even use my film on this?
Patience...
Onto the next round?
(Should I ask for a picture, I wonder...)
What are you wearing underneath, I wonder...
It looks like the gap's closing.
The game's heating up...
How's this flower going to blossom?
(P-pretty...)
Heh, looks I'm taking the lead!
It looks like the game is gonna wrap up soon.
Click!
What a lovely bloom...
... that was terrifying.
(Should I ask for a picture, I wonder...)
What are you wearing underneath, I wonder...
It looks like the gap's closing.
I wonder what this flower will look like when it blooms...
Just need patience, like developing a photo...
My oh my, how exciting...!
I wonder how many people would agree to play with me back home? Kel? Aubrey...? Sunny?
The game's heating up...
How's this flower going to blossom?
I-I can't say I have... though, I'm not sure I've ever seen a model in person to begin with...
Y-Yuri, are those... is everything okay...?
W-well, if it makes you feel any better, I don't know who you are...
(Should I tell her I can see her... unmentionables?)
(P-pretty...)
Heh, looks I'm taking the lead!
It looks like the game is gonna wrap up soon.
What kind of fruit will this flower make?
(It's not rude to stare in this context, is it?)
{small}Gosh, all these images swimming in my head...{!reset}
A-anyway, on to the next round?
Click!
What a lovely bloom...
Wah! Are you okay?!
C-can I take a picture...?
(Handsome...)
(Pretty...)
(Strong...)
Victory is as sweet as a honeysuckle...
Fair's fair.
Victory is spicier than cinnamon!
Let's see whose poppy is tallest.
(Gah... I can't help but imagine Sunny... oh, Sunny...)
Modest, like a tulip...
Versatile, like a rose...
(Ge-geez... that's... I'm reminded of how everyone crushed on Hero when they were younger.)
(... I wonder how big Kel is... o-oh...)
Sturdy, like a cactus...
Well, fair's fair, after all...
O-oh my... I've never seen this in person...
I certainly wouldn't to miss this...
(So slender... I'm being reminded of Cris; I guess it's one of the reasons she's a good swimmer.)
Honest, like a gladiolus...
(O-oh... so that's what they look like in person... I wonder if Aubrey would...)
Elegant, like a lily of the valley.
(Goodness... Kim is always wearing that oversized hoodie, I wonder if that's what she looks like underneath...)
(Stop thinking about Polly! She doesn't even look like that!)
Victory is spicier than cinnamon!
Shedding petals like a sakura, a luscious cherry underneath.
(Well-maintained, like a hedge...)
(Like an anthurium...)
(Free and untamed, like moss...)
(Smooth like a succulent...)
I-I can't believe I'm seeing this...
Oh, um... do you perhaps want any help? It's just your, uh... well...
So, er, what should I take off?
I'll try to keep my mind off of the next thing. How about you tell me a bit more about yourself?
So, i-it'd be your shirt next, right?
So... it's come to this, huh? Sorry, Rin...
... ah. You lost another hand, Rin...
So, Ignatz, you're a painter, right?
Miss, do you maybe have... aquaphobia? I'd get it if you do, me and my best friend have it as well...
A-anyway, miss, what about all the people who like the ocean? Or the people who need it for their job?
You said there was a Team Aqua too... do they think the same things about land?
Miss Magma, it kinda sounds more like you just want to be around people than support Team Magma itself...
Miss M-Magma, I'm just a b-bit worried... there was a weird recycling cult back in my hometown, and I'm being reminded of them a lot by how you talk about T-Team Magma...
... are y-you sure that you want the picture back? You look a lot p-prettier with out all that Magma stuff all over you... it's like a metaphor.
Say, that's a very interesting outfit... is it some kind of uniform, miss?
So, what motivates your painting, Ignatz?
Gosh, I can't imagine not having my camera... so many memories would have been forgotten...
I wish you well on your art, Ignatz! Maybe you'll become a good enough artist to draw your friends in a flash.
Do you not want to be an artist, Ignatz?
Um... I mean, I dunno about that, there's still lots of room to build houses and such...
... do you need help because you don't have arms?
I-I wouldn't dream of it! That'd be wrong.
(Don't touch her butt.) I-I see, that's really interesting! (Don't touch her butt.) It's admirable how you pursue your passions despite your handicap! (Don't touch her butt.)
W-well, a little bit... I'm just... not used to being so intimate with someone.
I wouldn't think of—er, wait, what? Your ear?
I wouldn't think of—er, wait, what? Your ear?
Team Magma... I don't think I've heard of them, sorry. What does your group do?
That's... what it means to be aquaphobic? One time I fell in a lake, and it felt like I kept getting dragged down by something... it was really scary.
... what's wrong with fish?
H-How'd you end up in Team Magma, anyway?
Do you have any friends outside work, though?

W-well, they said stuff like "we're all trash who need to be recycled" or s-something. L-like how p-people are worthless, and they should t-try to replace themselves... kinda like how you think of water and land.
A-alright... think about what I mentioned, okay?
Ehe, you remind me of my friend Mincy, always so humble...
Wow... I feel the same way! I took up photography so I can capture moments of people just living their own lives. There's just something special about them.
Flowers are lovely, yes, but what about moments in time? Capturing people acting naturally, enjoying themselves. Those moments... they'd go by before you could finish drawing them.

Hm, I guess it's true that most of my pictures are of people, but I just try to take pictures of any nice memories me and my friends have! And y-you don't have to keep calling me 'mister,' I'm pretty sure we're the same age...
... why does your father want you to be a knight so much?
Oh! You work in disaster relief! That's good, floods and tsunamis are really destructive.
Well, water's pretty important for lots of reasons! Rain, fishing, boats...

Oh... ~name~, you've been pretty quiet so far.
My friend, Sunny, is a bit like you, actually... he doesn't like to talk, but he always listens.

You don't like to talk much, do you, ~name~?
I have a friend who's like that, actually... he's quiet, but always takes the time to listen.
You seem like a pretty cheery person, ~name~... someone who can always see the bright side of things, like a sunflower.
I'm amazed that you're still so confident, ~name~, even while being... exposed like that.
(~name~ seems kind of... absent-minded, doesn't ~target.ifMale(he|she)~? Still... I guess that's cute, in its own way.)
W-Wow, ~name~, you seem... pretty enthusiastic about this. I don't think I could ever be that... open, about myself...

Wow, ~name~, you really dressed up for this!
Maybe you have fashion tips for a guy like me...?
(~name~ doesn't seem too happy about any of this... I wish Mari were here. I'm sure she could cheer ~target.ifMale(him|her)~ up.)
~name~... you seem pretty unfazed by all of this! My friend Sunny's a bit like that; it's difficult to get a reaction out of him at all, most of the time.
(...~name~ seems pretty dangerous. Should I even be here... or anywhere near them, really?)
You know, ~name~, you remind me of my friend, Mari! You're both so kind... I'm sure everyone can rely on you to help stay positive!
~name~, Mari... you two seem kind of similar! You're both so kind... I'm sure everyone can count on you two to help stay positive.
(...~name~ looks like they could use a friend. I should find a way to strike up a conversation...)
(Wow, ~name~'s pretty... what was the word Sunny used for this? Moe? I think that was it...)
(~name~ is pretty quick with barbed comments... reminds me of Aubrey, when she's around Kel.)
(Sheesh, ~name~ is pretty perverted... ~target.ifMale(He|She)~ takes it a bit too far with the comments, sometimes.)
(~name~'s... pretty flirty, huh? Kind of gets my heart racing, a bit...)
(~name~'s... pretty flirty, huh? Reminds me of Mari, especially with the way she teases Hero...)
~name~... you're pretty serious about this game, aren't you? No nonsense, with you around.
(Wow, ~name~ doesn't seem like the type to get out much... almost like Sunny. I don't even want to think about what would happen, if there wasn't anyone to bring him out of his shell...)
(...~name~ seems pretty shy. Maybe I should try to start a conversation?)
(Jeez, ~name~ is absolutely shameless! Honestly, ~target.ifMale(he|she)~ goes too far, sometimes...)
Wow, ~name~... you seem like you know all sorts of stuff. Reminds me of my friend, Hero-- there's almost no subject beyond his grasp.
~name~... you kind of remind me of my friend, Aubrey, with the whole... uhm, tough exterior. (...I wonder if she still carries around that nail bat?)
You're pretty quick with jokes, ~name~. Any advice on how to make people laugh like you do?
(Oh, jeez... ~name~ seems pretty dangerous. I should just try and stay out of ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ way.)
(~name~ is pretty prickly, isn't ~target.ifMale(he|she)~? Though... I'm sure ~target.ifMale(he|she)~ has a kind heart inside.)

~name~, there's really no need to be so hostile...
(Should I even be here? I don't want to get hurt...)
(Sheesh, ~name~ could really stand to be more polite to others... I'll just finish this quickly and get out of here.)
S-sorry. I can... overreact sometimes.
Oh, is she one of your friends?
Aw, shucks! You have really impressive conviction! I tend to just go along with what my friends do...
Well... maybe they couldn't see your charm. I'm not that great at first impressions myself, ehe...
O-oh, um... I'm sorry to hear that. Maybe you could tell me later...
Pokemon? Hoenn? Is this another one of those colliding worlds things? Mari did say I'd meet lots of unique people here...
I... I guess. It feels a bit extreme to try to make there be less water on the planet, though...
Hm... maybe I just have a different perspective because of the marine life where I'm from.
It's just that you seem... awfully devoted. You haven't even told me your actual name...

Ah, um, no, you are very pretty! I mean, that's not important! I mean... it's just... you sound like you could use a friend. I know what it's like to feel alone, to be pressured to join a shady crowd.
Click! I can take some pictures of you to show that you don't have to define yourself by the logo on your outfit.
Yay! A photo to celebrate your confidence. Click click click!
Y-you're really not bothersome... or rude... (Is this what people think of me?)
Ah, um, well there's things called cameras, and if you put film inside them, you can press their button to make a picture of what you're pointing them at!
Ack, sorry, I didn't mean to get so negative...
How come you don't simply hang up what you do paint?
M-maybe this is naive, but I don't see why you should listen to him... if your dad just drops you off somewhere and leaves you behind, he shouldn't get to control you that much.
~name~, you seem pretty uncomfortable... if you don't want to keep playing, you can just say so! I won't mind, at least.
~name~... are you sure you want to keep playing? You seem pretty uncomfortable with this.
~name~... if you don't want to keep playing, you can just say so! I won't mind, at least.
Um, ~name~... if you don't want to keep playing, just say so! I won't mind, really.
~name~... you don't seem very comfortable with this. Are you sure you want to keep playing?
... but without water, there wouldn't be any coastlines and ships wouldn't float?
W-well, yeah, swimming is kinda scary... I wouldn't want to take that away from the people who do like swimming, though.
Oh my... I've never seen a plant like that...
Oh my, I've never seen someone else do this...
So that's how another person does it...
O-oh, this is much different in person...
I-it's surprising to see the differences in how people do it...
Would you object to a picture? Click!
It's like watching pollination...
(It feels... exhilarating to do this with a real person.)
Ngh...
(Would it be weird to sync up with ~player~?)
(If just this is... so intense, then how does it feel to... go all the way?)
H-Harder...
Don't stop...
I want take a photo, but I don't want to look away...
{small}Maybe one pic won't hurt...{!reset} Click!
Everyone does this, right? {small} Then, that'd include... {!reset}
It's interesting to see how someone else does it...
Oh, um, good for you, Misty, I suppose?
O-oh... I've never thought about how women do this...
I can see why these are compared to flowers...
(I wonder... does it actually taste like cherry?)
Th-The moment's come, it seems...
(We were allowed to bring a covering for that part? How come Mari never told me...?)
I see, so that's what you do...
(... why do these get compared to cats?)
(Oh... ~name~'s really going at it...)
Click click click!
Well, I'm physically unharmed. Miraculously.
Well, that is... one use... of the power to... {small}go to alternate universes...{!reset}
I-I've got to take a picture of this! Click click click!
How scintillating...
O-oh, this is much different in person...
I-it's surprising to see the differences in how people do it...
Would you object to a picture? Click!
It's like watching pollination...
It's like digging in soil...
(It feels... exhilarating to do this with a real person.)
Ngh...
(Would it be weird to sync up with ~player~?)
(If just this is... so intense, then how does it feel to... go all the way?)
H-Harder...
Don't stop...
I want take a photo, but I don't want to look away...
{small}Maybe one pic won't hurt...{!reset} Click!
Everyone does this, right? {small} Then, that'd include... {!reset}
Wow... quite the experience...
(To photograph that expression...)
It's like sap... (I wonder if you could make syrup from it...)
(Always look toward the bright side, like a sunflower... )
I'm aware, Miss Magma, you don't have to rub it in...
Sigh... I'll just try to get it over with...
(Everything is going to be okay.)
(I've never done this much before... Maybe if I think about my friends...)
(Sunny...)
(Aubrey...)
(Bowen...)
(Mincy...)
(Daphne...)
(Ah! Don't put your mouth there, it's dirty...)
(A kiss...? Sure!)
(Oh... your hands are so skilled...)
(I've... always had a crush on you...)
(Please, don't stop...)
(What does it taste like...?)
Mmph!
O-oh...
(This is... exciting!)
Anh...!
Hie!
(Keep it up...)
Ngah~!
I think I understand what Mari was smirking about now...
(For once, I'm a bit relieved to be the only one with a camera...)
... hey, no one was recording that, right?
I'd rather... this not be commemorated, honestly. I'm fine with just remembering.
I wonder how my flowers would grow if I... no, that's disgusting! Stupid Basil...
